version_description:
* Added
- Support thumbnail
- Option to sort files in random order
- Option to show locked folder
- Option to show album folder
- Option to show iTunes folder
- Option to show index bar in list
- Filter for Album items : Video, Photo, All
- Individual sorting option by folders
- Subtitles line spacing
- Subtitle delay setting by long press gesture
- Subtitles folder to be designated
- Preview screen while searching with searching bar (only for local video file)
- Display Wi-Fi transfer status
- Support the scheme for launchers: nplayer://

* Fixed
- Fixed the issue of playback problem when Bluetooth device connected
- Fixed the issue of the failure to save the last played position
- Fixed the issue of the locked folder being unlocked
- Fixed the issue of text encoding
- Fixed the issue of a problem when fast forward / fast backward
- Fixed the issue of disappearing of the top-right button when direct URL / Playlist
- Fixed the issue of pop-up window size
- Fixed the issue of the failure to load file lists from GoogleDrive when they are too much.
- Fixed the issue of the failure to load all file lists when they are too many while UPnP connection.
- Fixed the issue of 'Stop Playing' with Clock app
- Fixed the issue of touch and hold gesture malfunction.
- Fixed the issue of some UPnP device connection problem.(need to re-register then after deleting existing UPnP server information.)
- Fixed the issue of not synchronizing the size of subtitles with video screen size when it is rescaled.
- Fixed the issue of memory leak while video file playback in background.
- Fixed the issue of the failure to delete files in some WebDAV
- Fixed the other bugs.

* Added
·  Improved playback performance (UI/UX)
·  Option to select menu type(Tab Bar, Sliding View)
·  Support PIP (QuickTime format ONLY)
·  Single file repetition
·  Support VoiceOver for subtitles
·  Option to show search box

* Fixed
·  Fixed the issue of DTS bitstream
·  Fixed the issue of playback paused when switching to slim mode while playing with ChromeCast
·  Fixed the issue of resetting playback information after moving or renaming a file
·  Fixed the issue of folder being unlock after moving or renaming a locked folder
·  Fixed the issue of iTunes Backup option error
·  Fixed the issue of OneDrive login problem
·  Fixed the issue of cellular data option not saved
·  Fixed the issue of m3u title displaying problem
·  Fixed the other bugs

- Supports Amazon Cloud Drive
- Supports 3D video mode
- Supports 3D touch (Quick Actions, Peek &Pop)
- Supports .sup, mpl2 and .txt subtitles.
- Highlights the last played item in each folders.
- Localizes Traditional Chinese.
- Improves hardware decoder performance
- Adds the function to save picture, movie files in Documents into Camera Roll
- Adds the function to copy files in iTunes and Album to Documents
- Displays download speed and estimated time to complete
- Displays playing time of movie or music in the list
- Fixes an issue of video stop occasionally while playing
- Fixes an issue of some FLAC files play problem
- Fixes the others
Bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Add option for Deinterlacing
- Add option for icon style
- Add feature to set passcode for network server (support touch ID)
- Fixes the issue of sound problem when playing some mp4 files
- Fixes other bugs

- Fixes an issue when downloading or playing a file via web browser.
- Fixes other bugs.

- Fixes an issue related to hardware decorder.

* Notice : Some issues have been reported in iOS 7 such as the bug in the initial executing stage and in the on-screen display for the information while playback(volume, brightness, ...). The issues are caused by the compatibility problem between Google Noto and iOS 7. We have fixed the issues and strongly advise you of iOS 7 users NOT TO UPDATE the current version until the revised update is available.

- Fixes an issue of on-screen information display bug while playback in iOS 7
- Improved caching speed of SSA/ASS font
Fixes an issue when logging in Windows 10 via SMB.

For the first time in the world, nPlayer supports DTS Headphone:X sound effect. And also playback performance has been enhanced greatly. Enjoy more powerful nPlayer now.

- Supports DTS Headphone:X
- Supports audio equalizer
- Supports Split View (iPad Air 2 / mini 4 / Pro)
- Improves playback performance greatly
- Supports playback in sleep mode when playing via HDMI / AirPlay mirroring (iOS 8 or later)
- Supports DivX
- Fixes other bugs

[3.3.1]
- Bug fixes and stability improvements.

[3.3.0]
- Supports DTS Headphone:X
- Supports audio equalizer
- Supports Split View (iPad Air 2 / mini 4 / Pro)
- Improves playback performance greatly
- Supports playback in sleep mode when playing via HDMI / AirPlay mirroring (iOS 8 or later)
- Supports DivX
- Fixes other bugs

- Adds mini player for audio playback.
- Bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Adds option for staring with mini player when playing audio file
- Fixes SMB log in problem in OS X (10.11.5)
- Fixes VoiceOver issue
- Fixes other bugs

- Supports FTPS (FTP over SSL)
- Bug fixes and stability improvements
- The title has been changed to ’nPlayer Plus’.
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- Supports Bluetooth keyboard 
- Bug fixes

[Keyboard shortcuts]
Space - Play/Pause
Left/Right Arrow - Fast Backward/Forward
Ctrl + Left/Right Arrow- Previous/Next Track
Up/Down Arrow - Volume
Alt + Up/Down Arrow - Brightness
Ctrl + Up/Down Arrow - Playback Rate
Cmd + Q - Exit

- Supports all video formats(MKV, AVI, MP4, etc.) including H.264 video when using AirPlay
- Supports subtitles when using AirPlay
- Supports all video formats(MKV, AVI, MP4, etc.) including H.264 video when using Chromecast
- Enable to change audio track when using Chromecast
- Supports all video formats(MKV, AVI, MP4, etc.) including H.264 video in PiP mode
- Supports subtitles in PiP mode
- Supports OpenSubtitles
- Adds option to display SSA/ASS subtitles as text type
- Improved many other features and usability
- Fixes other bugs

- Bug fixes

** Amazon has ended support for all third-party apps that use the Amazon Drive API as of August 16, 2019. So Amazon Cloud Drive is no longer supported in this app.
** The minimum version of iOS is now 9.0.
